query.prompt:
For each row in the table, fill in columns 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 with the direct translation of column 1.
| Malay | Lemma | English | Italian | Indonesian | Arabic | Sanskrit | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | Di | di | | | | | | | tengah-tengah | tengah | | | | | | | perjalanan | perjalanan | | | | | | | hidup | hidup | | | | | | | kita | kita | | | | | | | aku | aku | | | | | | | menemukan | temu | | | | | | | diriku | diri | | | | | | | di | di | | | | | | | dalam | dalam | | | | | | | hutan | hutan | | | | | | | yang | yang | | | | | | | gelap | gelap | | | | | | | karena | karena | | | | | | | jalan | jalan | | | | | | | yang | yang | | | | | | | lurus | lurus | | | | | | | telah | telah | | | | | | | hilang | hilang | | | | | |
